LanguageData.VFEE_GreatHierarchy.label: Велика ієрархія
LanguageData.VFEE_GreatHierarchy.description: This screen allows you to view all members of the Empire faction. You can spend honor to invite them as visitors.
LanguageData.VFEE_Permits.label: Дозволи
LanguageData.VFEE_Permits.description: This screen allows you to customize and select permits for each of your noble people.
LanguageData.VFEE_Vassalage.label: Васалітет
LanguageData.VFEE_Vassalage.description: This screen allows you to vassalize nearby Imperial bases to gain regular tithes from them.
LanguageData.VFEE_Honors.label: Почесті
LanguageData.VFEE_Honors.description: This screen allows you to apply previously unlocked honorable titles to your colonists, providing them with unique but very specific perks.
